configspawners.configuration.title: Configurable Spawners
Determines both minimum and maximum delays between spawns.
The maximum number of entities to spawn per wave.
configspawners.configuration.maxNearbyEn: The maximum number of entities that can be loaded around the spawner.
configspawners.configuration.requiredPla: The minimum range required for the spawner to become active.
The maximum range from the spawner where entities can spawn.
